/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g    -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/image_common/image_transport/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/pluginlib/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/vision_opencv/cv_bridge/lib -pthread CMakeFiles/Fusion.dir/src/fusion.o CMakeFiles/Fusion.dir/src/main.o  -o ../bin/Fusion -rdynamic -L/opt/ros/fuerte/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/image_common/image_transport/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/pluginlib/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/vision_opencv/cv_bridge/lib -limage_transport -lpoco_lite -lboost_fs_wrapper -ltinyxml -lroslib -lmessage_filters -lroscpp -lrostime -lrosconsole -lroscpp_serialization -lxmlrpcpp -lcv_bridge -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_contrib -lopencv_core -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_flann -lopencv_gpu -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_legacy -lopencv_ml -lopencv_nonfree -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_photo -lopencv_stitching -lopencv_ts -lopencv_video -lopencv_videostab -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/image_common/image_transport/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/pluginlib/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/vision_opencv/cv_bridge/lib
